mapper.select: select i.svdi_siid as staffId,i.svdi_viid as voteId, i.svdi_voiid as voteOptionId from tstaff_vote_detail_info i where i.svdi_siid = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and i.svdi_viid= #{voteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tstaff_vote_detail_info (svdi_siid, svdi_viid, svdi_voiid, svdi_voidetail, svdi_votetime) values (#{staffId},#{voteInfoId},#{voteOptionId},#{optionDetail},#{voteTime})
